item.description:
If anyone is looking for a little fun and excitement on  a Saturday evening, and don't already have plans for August 18, consider coming up to Southern, NH for an inexpensive, fun evening.

This is rare and will be exciting!  Three Vegas trained hypnotists doing a stage show together.  WOW!

Chris Adshade, Adam Justin, and I are teaming up to do a Stage Show at Whispering Pines Campground in Newton, NH (between Plaistow and Kingston).  The fee is the usual visitor fee of $6 and you BYOB, but you get to enjoy a truly wonderful and informal hypnosis show.

The address is

8 Wenmark Road
Newton, NH  03858
(800) 847-4969

The show starts at 7pm, be there by 6:30pm.

Call me if you have any questions come - 978-273-5905.

Hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Come into Office/Rec Hall - Pak in parking lot accross from rec hall

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Comedy Stage Show
